dct_title_s: NIEUWE KAART VAN DE NOORD POOL na de alderlaatste ondekkiing int licht gebracht tot Amsterdam
dct_description_sm: With “door J. Keyser get en gesn. 1735” below banderole. Named California places are: Kaap Blanco, Kaap Mendocin, Pt.S.Francis, and St. Barbera R.

[1740?], with Italian place names and title: NUOVA CARTA DEL POLO ARTICO secondo l'ultime osservazioni / Da Isac Tirion. Named California places are: C. Blanco, C.Mendocin, P. S. Francis, and S. Barbera F. Issued in: Atlante novissimo che contiene tutte le parti del mondo, nel quale sono esattamente descritti gl' imperj, le monarchie, stati, republiche, ec. ... , [V.1, no.21]/ G. Delisle. -- Venezia: G. Albrizzi Q. Girol., 1740-1750.
With Italian place names as in State 2, but with simple title: NUOVA CARTA DEL POLO ARTICO, and without cartographer identification. Attributed to G. De L'Isle, 1740.
LC 594 and 600; Nordenskiöld (p.250, Plate 118); Nordenskiöld Collection 1,64(21); UCB.
Title on banderole at top of map.
Issued in his: Nieuwe en beknopte hand-atlas, Map 12. -- Amsterdam, 1744-[1769]. Reissued in 1765 [Map 11].
Northern part of California shown, with rounded northern coast. Mozeemlek Country to its north, with suggestion of a strait and land to northwest.
